articles.author: Adewale Olarinde
articles.title: Bitcoin sees liquidations worth millions in a day: Is BTC’s price feeling the heat? - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: Bitcoin sees a slight recovery, but the holders that recently bought are still rooted in losses.
articles.content:
• Bitcoin saw a slight recovery after the decline.
  • Liquidation has tapered off after the price decline caused a spike.
Bitcoin [BTC] experienced a significant drop in the last … [+2986 chars]
